title: High ping no solution
body:
Have constant 180 ping that spikes up to 500
Can someone help?

replies.body: Damn that's rough!  It sounds like you've got a pretty unstable connection and packet loss.  You can use the [log reader](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/209765743-Connection-Troubleshooting-Log-Reader) just in case for an overview.  I recommend going through each step of the [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide to help tune things up a bit.  I hope that helps!

Tried it it says i do have packet loss in some games
i have activated QoS and nothing happend i close all other running programs and set league to high priority in task manager
in other game like world of tanks im getting 45 to 50 average
also im running wired connection
